name: Speedy Pizza
description:
Work as a delivery boy in the pizzeria "Mamma Mia"!

Run, jump and drive around, try to make as much money as you can!

Deliver all the pizzas before the timer reaches zero and be careful to not upset the boss.

He is a kind person but he gets angry very easily, if you are fast enough he might give you raise but if  fail he won’t think twice about firing you!

-------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls:

  • Move/Drive: WASD
  • Jump/Reverse Gear: Space
  • Interact: E
  • Enter/Exit car: F

Gamepad Controls:

  • Move/Drive: Left Stick
  • Accelerate: RT
  • Brake: LT
  • Jump: A
  • Interact: X
  • Enter/Exit car: Y
  • Reverse Gear: B
